articles.author: Ganesh Rao
articles.title: Credit Suisse is under pressure, but short sellers appear to be eyeing another global bank - CNBC
articles.description: Investor anxiety over Credit Suisse has sent its shares tumbling over recent days, but short sellers appear to be eyeing another European bank, data shows.

articles.title: Mortgage lender hikes variable and fixed rates by up to 2 percentage points - Independent.ie
